DOC.brief_summary: This randomize controlled trial investigating effect direct swallow train oral sensorimotor stimulation preterm infant oral feeding performance .
DOC.brief_title: Direct Swallowing Training Oral Sensorimotor Stimulation Preterm Infants
DOC.criteria: Preterm infant : 24+0 ~ 32+0 week gestation Appropriate gestational age infant ( birth weight : 10 % ~ 90 % ) Infants receive full tube feeding ( 120 kcal/kg/day ) Infants discontinue nasal continuous positive airway pressure postmenstrual age 33+0 week 'Feeders grower ' Major congenital anomaly : face , central nervous system , gastrointestine , heart , etc Gastrointestinal complication Chronic medical complication : Intraventricular hemorrhage Grade III IV , periventricular leukomalacia , surgical necrotizing enterocolitis
